name: Mandibuzz BREAK
author: 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Wings of Disaster
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance. Discard all Pokémon Tool cards attached to each of your opponent’s Pokémon.

rule_box: Mandibuzz BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.
